favourite.article: Awesome hymn and tune. It's also in the Chinese Supplement. I enjoy that "with the saints it's easy to be bold" to lay hold of this life, this spring.
I enjoyed this one just the other day too, Hollie! praise Him for His life in us, it is deeper than our mind...!

Hallelujah! In the church there can be such a deep and peaceful life! A life free from religious duty and moral obligation, a life of just eating and drinking Christ! Praise the Lord! May He have such mercy on us that we would continually grow deeper in our turn to Him!
As the Spirit He flows; In our spirit He grows! Lord grow in my spirit!!! Praise the Lord!!!
Thank the Lord because He captured my heart we would move by life in everything we do.
